review: Does the trick. Disconnected from wifi once but other than that no issues. I just wish more stuff came free with Amazon Prime as far as movies and TV shows that's my main problem with it

review: Amazing array of shows and movies available through the Netflix and Huluplus apps. This purchase was a great choice.

review: Great device!  My smart blue tooth just wasn't getting a regular signal so i gave this a try and it set up quickly and works great.  Enjoying Bosch, an Amazon tv series, that is included with the 30 day Prime trial you get with this purchase.
author: Amazon Customer
